tool_description: Generates customized pricing strategies for different customer segments based on their characteristics, elasticity, and competitive landscape.

customer_segments.description: Customer segments to create pricing strategies for

elasticity_data.description: Price elasticity coefficients for each segment

business_objectives.description: Primary business objectives: revenue_maximization, profit_maximization, market_share, customer_retention

competitive_position.description: Current competitive position: premium, competitive, value, budget

risk_tolerance.description: Risk tolerance level: conservative, moderate, aggressive

seasonal_adjustments.description: Whether to include seasonal pricing adjustments

error_messages: Mismatched data arrays: customer_segments, segment_characteristics, and elasticity_data must have the same length.
Invalid business objectives: Use one or more of [revenue_maximization, profit_maximization, market_share, customer_retention].
Invalid competitive position: Use one of [premium, competitive, value, budget].
Invalid target margin: target_margin must be between 5 and 80.
Invalid strategy horizon: strategy_horizon_months must be between 1 and 24.
Invalid risk tolerance: Use one of [conservative, moderate, aggressive].
Empty segments: Provide at least one customer segment for strategy generation.
usage: Provide customer_segments, segment_characteristics, elasticity_data, business_objectives, and competitive_position. Optionally set pricing_constraints, target_margin, strategy_horizon_months, risk_tolerance, and seasonal_adjustments. Returns tailored pricing strategies for each segment.

segment_strategies.description: Detailed pricing strategies for each customer segment

recommended_price_points.description: Recommended starting price points for each segment

strategy_rationale.description: Business rationale for each segment's pricing strategy

expected_outcomes.description: Expected business outcomes from implementing each strategy
